description:
Kogai-dono pretends to over indulge in a rare alcohol in order to trick Shuyu into getting trapped in the store room with Saku-dono to force them to get along.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kougai Makes a Plan to Deceive Her Allies
Kougai opracowuje plan, aby oszukać swoich sojuszników
Kougai, Kaku o Mochiite Mikata o Azamuku no Koto
黄蓋, 策を用いて味方を欺くのこと
